article: bitbay traded 9.1 % higher against the us dollar during the 1 day period ending at 7:00 am et on january 24th . one bitbay coin can now be purchased for about $ 0.13 or 0.00001199 btc on popular exchanges including cryptopia , bittrex and c-cex . bitbay has a market cap of $ 133.90 million and $ 1.73 million worth of bitbay was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours . over the last week , bitbay has traded 32.9 % higher against the us dollar . here 's how similar cryptocurrencies have performed over the last 24 hours : qtum traded up 10.2 % against the dollar and now trades at $ 40.93 or 0.00369910 btc .

nushares traded down 11.1 % against the dollar and now trades at $ 0.0154 or 0.00000140 btc . blackcoin traded down 0.3 % against the dollar and now trades at $ 0.53 or 0.00004787 btc . radium traded up 4.5 % against the dollar and now trades at $ 9.42 or 0.00085113 btc . rubycoin traded up 8.3 % against the dollar and now trades at $ 1.18 or 0.00010666 btc . global currency reserve traded 13.4 % higher against the dollar and now trades at $ 0.19 or 0.00001750 btc . atmos traded 15.9 % lower against the dollar and now trades at $ 0.13 or 0.00001152 btc .

cybcsec traded 1 % lower against the dollar and now trades at $ 0.0070 or 0.00000063 btc . bitbay coin profilebitbay is a proof-of-stake coin that uses the proof of stake hashing algorithm . it launched on november 10th , 2014 . bitbay 's total supply is 1,009,304,646 coins . bitbay 's official website is bitbay . market . the reddit community for bitbay is / r/bitbay and the currency 's github account can be viewed here . bitbay 's official twitter account is @bitbaymarket and its facebook page is accessible here . according to cryptocompare , `` bitbay is a proof of stake cryptocurrency with a 1 % apy in staking rewards .

bitbay provides many additional tools like smart-contract capabilities , an in-wallet decentralized e-commerce platform , `` pay-to-email '' transactions , asset pegging and more . `` buying and selling bitbaybitbay can be traded on these cryptocurrency exchanges : cryptopia , c-cex and bittrex . it is not presently possible to purchase bitbay directly using u. s. dollars . investors seeking to acquire bitbay must first purchase ethereum or bitcoin using an exchange that deals in u. s. dollars such as changelly , gemini or gdax . investors can then use their newly-acquired ethereum or bitcoin to purchase bitbay using one of the exchanges listed above .
